title: Ottawa Protest Organizer Previously Met With United Front Official in China
description: Zhang Jian (8th L) was seen among the key organizers of a protest on Parliament Hill in Ottawa on June 24, 2023. Zhang is a director of the "Commission of Marking the 100th Anniversary of Chinese Exclusion Act" that held the protest. (The Epoch Times)

title: 11 Million Low- or Modest-Income Canadians to Receive One-Time Grocery Rebate on July 5
description: Grocery prices have been rising significantly in Canada, largely due to inflation. (The Canadian Press/Nathan Denette)

title: Feds Issued Security Bulletin Falsely Claiming Freedom Convoy Protesters Raiding Gov’t Buildings: Documents
description: Protesters mark the first anniversary of police removal of Freedom Convoy protesters from downtown Ottawa, in Ottawa on Feb. 18, 2023. (Jonathan Ren/The Epoch Times)

title: Michael Taube: Why Is It So Difficult for a Conservative to Be Elected Mayor in Canada?
description: Newly elected Toronto Mayor Olivia Chow speaks to media outside city hall in Toronto on June 27, 2023. (The Canadian Press/Arlyn McAdorey)

title: Canada to Deploy Two More Warships to Search for Mines in European Waters
description: HMCS Fredericton is on manoeuvres in Frobisher Bay at the southern tip of Baffin Island, taking part in a sovereignty exercise in a file photo. (Michel Comte/AFP via Getty Images)

title: ANALYSIS: Chinese Premier’s Europe Trip Exposes His Weak Position in CCP
description: Chinese Premiere Li Qiang arrives at the Munich Residence on June 20, 2023 in Munich, Germany.  (Johannes Simon/Getty Images)

title: Perks for Federal Staff Included $400–$500 Home Office Expense Tax Credit: CRA

title: NHS England Sets up 7 More Gambling Addition Clinics Amid Steep Rise in Demand
description: A man poses for a photograph with the logo for online gambling website Bet365 displayed on a smartphone, in London, UK, on Dec. 18, 2019. (Paul Ellis/AFP via Getty Images)

title: French Mayor Alleges Rioters Tried to Assassinate Him in Fifth Night of Violence
description: French Prime Minister Elisabeth Borne (R), and Interior Minister Gerald Darmanin (C) talks to Vincent Jeanbrun, the Mayor of L'Hay-les-Roses (L) as they meet with municipal police, after rioters rammed a vehicle into the mayor's house overnight, in L'Hay-les-Roses, south of Paris, on July 2, 2023. (Charly Triballeau/Pool/AFP via Getty Images)

title: Woman Sacked for Saying ‘Biological Sex Is Real’ Wins £100,000 Compensation
description: Undated handout photo of Maya Forstater, issued on  April 27, 2021. (PA Media)

title: Russian Media Watchdog Blacklists Outlets Linked to Wagner Mercenary Chief
description: Yevgeny Prigozhin, the owner of the Wagner Group military company, records his video addresses in Rostov-on-Don, Russia, on June 24, 2023. (Prigozhin Press Service via AP)

title: Kidnapped Mexican Security Staff Freed After 3-Day Search
description: State security ministry employees, who were kidnapped by members of an armed group days ago, react after meeting their relatives after being freed, outside the Secretary of Public Security and Citizen Protection of Chiapas, in Tuxtla Gutierrez building, Mexico, on June 30, 2023. (Jacob Garcia/Reuters)

title: Australia Sees First Budget Surplus in 15 Years; $19 Billion Boost From Soaring Commodities
description: Haulage truck at the Rio Tinto West Angelas iron ore mine in the Pilbara region of West Australia, on July 9, 2014. (AAP Image/Alan Porritt)

title: Russia Launches First Overnight Drone Attack on Kyiv in 12 Days: Ukrainian Military
description: An explosion of a drone in the sky over the city during a Russian drone strike, amid Russia's attack on Ukraine, in Kyiv, Ukraine, on June 20, 2023. (Gleb Garanich/Reuters)

title: ‘Lack Backbone’: Liberal Leader on Corporates Backing ‘Yes’ Vote
description: Australian Opposition Leader Peter Dutton (C) speaks to media during a press conference alongside Indigenous Senators Kerrynne Liddle (L) and Jacinta Price (R) in Adelaide, Australia on April 18, 2023. (AAP Image/Michael Errey)

title: Calmer Conditions After Windy Airport Flight Chaos
